note.p: Born in Rochester, Kent. Married Henry Desborough in 1834; widowed, 1862. Mother of thirteen children, including Edward Brandram Desborough, and Louisa A’hmuty Desborough, who married Wallis Nash of the Rookery, Down, Kent. Associated with Down School Board during the 1870s, when she lived at Laurel Grove, Down.
Correspondence vol. 21, letter to Down School Board, [after 29 November 1873]
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1874
